title: OatMind
description: OatMind is a lightweight, offline-first note-taking app built for mindful productivity. No login, no internet, no subscription. Just a calm, secure space to think, plan, and reflect. Whether you're journaling, organizing your day, or capturing big ideas, OatMind is designed to be distraction-free, fast, and private. Simple by design, powerful in purpose. Your thoughts stay yours. Now in Beta and ready to explore.
